params.812: Reach level 10 in the Magic skill.
params.813: Ensure you have runes for a spell you can cast at your Magic level. The Cows north east of Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.
params.814: Train your Magic to level 10 by fighting nearby monsters!|Equip your armour and weapon.|Ensure you have runes for the spell you would like to cast.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|The Cows north east of Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight. You can cast spells over the fence and some other scenery. This means that the cows will not be able to attack you, but you can attack the cow.|You can bury bones to gain Prayer experience.
params.823: Use obstacles when using Magic combat to avoid taking damage.
params.936: A hint arrow has been added above a Cow you could attack.
params.938: Look for a Cow near the hint arrow location.
